author: Jay Basil

text: @SupraDarky There is nothing wrong there.  I still play hot seat games of HOMM3 with friends.  This game holds up to the test of time extremely well.  It's easily the best in the series, though for your best VGM check out the water theme from HOMMIV.  Heroes 5 is pretty darn good too but the hot seat games are not as fun because of the lack of random maps with teams.

author: thisbarb

text:
Ah yes!! This brings back memories, Wow!!

One of the best PC games I ever played! This one was the best in the series imo!
author: Boyce18

text:
This...  This reminds me of my very early childhood introduction to gaming. T_T    I miss my very early life. I should probably stop lamenting the loss of my early childhood and just walk about 5 feet to my left and pick the game up and download it.
And thus, that is what I did. =D
author: Wyatt Kunzelman

text:
One of the all time greats in gaming, it really never gets old. I remember showing it to a roommate of mine a couple of years back. Got up at 5 am to get something to drink, and he was still playing, and had been for 14 hours straight cause he couldnt put it down.
Personally i find the Stronghold theme the cream of the crop, but this is a close second :)

text: This is easily my favorite game in the series, from the ones I've played. I spent some time on the single player, but I've played hours and hours multiplayer with friends.
